RMC.BackstoryDef.label: spacemarine backstory
RMC.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Since joining the orbital-deployment shock troop corps [PAWN_nameDef] has fought in countless battles with distinction and honor.\n\nEnemies of the empire fear the spacemarines more than any other imperial force, for good reason.
RMC.BackstoryDef.title: Spacemarine

RMC.BackstoryDef.label: technical officer backstory
RMC.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: During [PAWN_possessive] education at the naval academy [PAWN_nameDef] was selected for tech-ops corps. [PAWN_pronoun] was educated in mathematics, science, and technology\n\nThen assigned to the imperial spacemarine corp as a technical officer.
RMC.BackstoryDef.title: Technical officer

RMC.BackstoryDef.label: medical officer backstory
RMC.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: During [PAWN_possessive] education at the naval academy [PAWN_nameDef] was selected for the medical corps. [PAWN_pronoun] was educated in surgery, bionics, and combat medicine.\n\nThen assigned to the imperial spacemarine corp as a medical officer.
RMC.BackstoryDef.title: Medical officer

RMC.BackstoryDef.label: officer backstory
RMC.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After graduating from the naval academy [PAWN_nameDef] became a commissioned officer in the imperial spacemarine corps.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] was eventually honored for exceptional service and assigned to the orbital-deployment shock troop division.
RMC.BackstoryDef.title: Imperial officer
